entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper at Hogwarts and a half-giant. He is described as chuckling and beaming at Harry.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character of the story. He is described as not being a wizard, but having strange things happen to him when he is upset or angry.

entities.name: dudley dursley
entities.description: Dudley Dursley is Harry's cousin and the son of Uncle Vernon. He is described as hitting Harry and being chased by a boa constrictor.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is Harry's uncle and the father of Dudley. He is described as not wanting Harry to go to Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Hagrid encourages Harry, saying he will be famous at Hogwarts.
Dudley is attacked by a boa constrictor set by Harry.
